Articles.Content: So, I'm running KSP on Arch and am unable to launch KSP. When launching from steam I can tell it launches the window for KSP but then immediately closes it. I haven't played in a while, but I have been able to play KSP on my Arch install before, so something changed at some point that I need to fix >_>
Im having the same problem. try rolling back to the last version on steam and it might work, it just wont be the updated version. So until they fix it ill be playing the old version.

Hey. It's hard to say what's going on without all of the information. As well as the log files and other stuff mentioned in the bug reporting guide thread, it would probably be useful to include the contents of your ~/.xsession-errors log file, where console output from programs launched via the GUI ends up.
